thread.title: US officials in summit planning talks at the border between North and South Korea

author: Getty Images
title: US officials in summit planning talks at the border between North and South Korea
text:
World News US officials in summit planning talks at the border between North and South Korea A US delegation is meeting with counterparts from North and South Korea, a State Department official said on Sunday. The talks are in preparation for a high-stakes summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim-Jong Un. Published 21 Mins Ago Getty Images Donald Trump (l) and Kim Jung Un (r).
A U.S. delegation is meeting with North Korean officials in Panmunjom, at the border between North and South Korea, about a possible U.S.-North Korea summit, a State Department spokeswoman said on Sunday.
"A U.S. delegation is in ongoing talks with North Korean officials at Panmunjom," spokeswoman Heather Nauert said in a statement. "We continue to prepare for a meeting between the President and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un."
